name: Time Surge 3: A Giant Leap Too Far
name_original: Time Surge 3: A Giant Leap Too Far
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 51 "Every 10 seconds"

Responding to a mysterious distress signal you arrive at a derelict spaceship. Will you be brave enough to board it, clever enough to uncover it's mysteries, and fast enough to find your way back?

It's one small step for a game, one Time Surge 3: A Giant Leap Too Far for us all. Climb aboard and find yourself reading ship's logs, going for a space walk, playing with mirrors, and even running for your life, but you better hope the equipment doesn't malfunction or every 10 seconds you might lose yourself.

Controls
  • Move - Arrows / WASD / ZQSD
  • Primary Action (High Energy Remote Agitator) - X / N / Enter 
  • Secondary Action (Emergency Recall Button) - C / M / Space
Tips and Tricks
  • coming soon...
